comments:
Build ID: I20070608-1718

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Installed this build yesterday (on top of 3.3M3)
2. Worked fine, shut down at end of day.
3. Opened eclipse today, got this error in almost every pane (Package Explorer, Editor, JUnit, Call Hierarchy, etc).
4. Tried bouncing eclipse a few times, closing and opening views, still got it.

Not sure if you'll be able to reproduce it, but I figure the NPE should at least be handled better.  Thanks for a great product and any help.

More information:

What do you mean by installed on top of 3.3 M3?  Did you unzip over or use an update site to upgrade?

I have not been able to track down a cause for this.  It appears to be a corrupted cache.  Can you zip up and attach the content configuration/org.eclipse.osgi folder from the eclipse installation that is failing for you?  

After you have saved the cache try running with the -clean option to see if it clears things up for you.  Thanks.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 184127 ***
